title: Research from IDC
body:
# Themes ## Some themes

[Unable to view properly?](https://public.flourish.studio/visualisation/3399281/) # Development of themes across time ## Overview
[Unable to view properly?](https://public.flourish.studio/visualisation/3434019/) To view development of each theme over time, [use this grid view of the same visualisation here](https://public.flourish.studio/visualisation/3434401/) # Instances of themes across time ## Overview
[Unable to view properly?](https://public.flourish.studio/visualisation/3418107/) To view development of each instance over time, [use this grid view of the same visualisation here](https://public.flourish.studio/visualisation/3434418/) [Full Story--a presentation of visualisations](https://sharp-hoover-ee91b0.netlify.app/blog/2020-08-10-research-in-idc-at-a-glance/)
